website_summaries.verdict: Sony's camera is easy to use and offers the feel and performance of higher-end options.
pros: Large form factor fits well in the hands during long periods of shooting
Comes with a 35x optical zoom for some of the best telephoto shots
cons: Integrated lens has poor low-light performance
Camera body is too big to fit in a pocket

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera Bring Extra AA Batteries
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera, I was able to capture some amazing pictures while on vacation in Morocco. The only down side was use of AA batteries (videos and zooming really eats away at battery life) however I prepared myself and kept enough batteries on hand to switch everyday if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Beat the Value
customer_reviews.text: I received this camera today, was taking photos in less than 15 minutes, and advanced photos in under an hour. The camera is ultra-intuitive and does virtually everything for you. The auto focus and image stabilization functions both appear to be perfect. NOTE: If there's one drawback it's this...the camera has extremely limited manual adjustments and no manual focus - the next model up (DSC-HX300) does. As a replacement for a Konica-Minolta S414 that I bought for 3 times the money back in 2002, I could not be more pleased...at least after 2 hours. This is an exceptional camera for this price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Foster

customer_reviews.title: We bought this for my son, who needed a ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son, who needed a camera fora basic photography class at college. he needed a camera that was had a manually adjustable ISO, White balance, aperture, etc - and this camera fit the bill without breaking our budget. If he were to continue with photography, we would have picked up a full SLR, but this class was just a basic requirement within his major, so we didn't need the fuller featured camera.
customer_reviews.author: Gene H.

customer_reviews.title: Great pics for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera. Only thing I would change is that it has 4 AAA batteries. Takes great quality pics for price of camera. My second Sony camera and that is all I will buy. Have had Canon, Nikon, Olympia, etc. Sony is the best in my book.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyRose333

customer_reviews.title: A good start but you can probably get better
customer_reviews.text: Overall this camera is great, the image quality is wonderful and the user interface is very user friendly and welcoming to new photographers. My complaint however is the battery life, it’s personally strange that it uses AA batteries in this day and age because quite frankly the battery isn’t gonna last very long, the workaround is using rechargeable batteries however features such as zooming and video recording will absolutely drain the battery life, for this reason I will give it three stars If you’re getting into photography and want to start small then this camera is great but I would recommend shelling a couple of dollars more for the newer models that have released
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: The close ups are amazing even with a flash
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take pictures for eBay. The close ups are amazing even with a flash. I was a little reluctant because the camera was made in 2012 which I thought might be too old of a technology but it was not.
customer_reviews.author: KODEN

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera for a great price. The zoom is incredible! Shortly after purchasing it we took it on our beach vacation. From 18 floors up, we could zoom in on things down on the beach with remarkable clarity. We were able to get some amazing pictures! It takes wonderful sunset pictures. Sometimes it is a little slow taking a picture, but other than that we love everything about it. It is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny T

customer_reviews.title: This Sony is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Canon fan, but I tried this because one of my smaller Canon handhelds got dropped one too many times (my hands' tremor). This Sony is easy to use, but I don't like that I can't rapid fire and have the date stamp. It seems to be one or the other. I need the time stamp for the work I do. And I'd like to takes shots in rapid progression.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a digital camera that was any fancier than the cheapo point and shoot ones that everybody carried around in their purses in the early 2000's. This camera was very intuitive. I was able to take some nice photos without much of a learning curve at all. The attached photos are one of a Furby on a shelf that was roughly 6 feet away and my cat that was sitting on my lap at the time. Despite the difference in distance the photos were taken from, both look nicely detailed to me.
customer_reviews.author: Lynk

customer_reviews.title: great camera on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Got this on amazon warehouse for under $100. I love the optical zoom. The auto focus does take some getting used to. It seems slow to me. Once it gets it roght though the picture quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: woojo

customer_reviews.title: Memory stick not included!!️
customer_reviews.text: Never had a camera like this before. We are going to a remote mountainous location, setting up the functions, reading the instructions and it says “memory stick sold separately”! Sony said I can’t take pictures without a memory stick!!!!!!!! Wow, my mountain scenery vacation is ruined...to say I’m upset is and understatement!
customer_reviews.author: TBerg

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. The camera takes AA BATTERIES and is only as good as the batteries! Once the batteries get used a little, the camera FAILS big time. ORANGE and BLUE coloring...BLURRINESS . Videos are constantly blurring in and out. So disappointed! I love Sony cameras but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind King

customer_reviews.title: Great zoom, nice quality, awful on battery
customer_reviews.text: The zoom is an awesome feature, works great and takes really nice photos. The zoome drains the battery SO fast though. My initial batteries that came with the camera gave me maybe 10-15 pictures, and the rechargeable batteries I replaced those with earlier this morning are already low. Great beginner camera, but carry *tons* of extra batteries.
customer_reviews.author: J. Symonds

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and features
customer_reviews.text: I bought this digital camera to replace a 14 year old one. Sony has always been known to produce excellent electronic equipment and this camera does not disappoint! It was very easy to use and the automatic features of the camera produce great pictures. I'm very happy with the camera and with Cameta Camera as well!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for casual users
customer_reviews.text: A very nice camera, but not nearly a self-explanatory as my old Sony DSCH200. Lack of an in-hand manual (one has to rummage around the internet to find the information you need) only serves to complicate things. Great zoom capabilities, and I find the battery consumption much improved from my old DSCH200. Great quality pictures, and greater ability to edit and explore pictures in camera. All in all a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: maeja

customer_reviews.title: Slow, decent camera
customer_reviews.text: Extremely slow camera. Definitely not good for sports or action or semi:pro photography. It's OK for basic everyday use, but I stress the Ok part. Good for stationary subjects. Honestly, you can get a point and shoot that's faster, or spend the extra to get a good dslr
customer_reviews.author: Kiralee

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed, happy and eager to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. LCD is bright and clear. Comes with some batteries so you can play with it as soon as it comes in. I really like it so far, I'm not a pro or even some kind of photographer but this is an awesome buy. I was gunna get a Nikon but chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: LIKE A ROCK
customer_reviews.text: "used like new in original packaging". that was about it, because it did not work. turn on,turn off maybe. try to snap a pic it would freeze, not functions at all. spoke with "tech help", no it's just an Amazon operator. returning and had to buy a different one and pay for that one until they get the brick back.
customer_reviews.author: SF GIANT-49ER

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: It was a great purchase. Point and shoot cameras may not have the flexibility of an SLR (I've alwaays been an SLR guy) but they are quick and super simple to use. Great photos with everything you need for the amatuer photographer. If you are looking for an easy to use camera this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Slammin'

customer_reviews.title: Nice, inexpensive and suits my workplace needs
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my matte-making for animation work as the high resolution multiplies my image editing options. As an inveterate cheapskate the numbers on this worked for me too. This is not a Mickey Mouse home toy if you take the time to actually examine and apply the range of settings available on the menu. The only drawback was the lack of an SLR shielded view option. The open 3" x 2.5" screen is useless under normal light conditions. I compensate for it by using a right-angle mirrored attachment which fits over the screen. I now have a digital Yashicamat TLR with only one lens :>P
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get rechargable batteries with it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera. It takes really nice pictures, including panoramic and other features. Only complaint is it goes through a lot of batteries. I suggest getting rechargeable batteries if you buy this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Had it over a year with no problems!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this camera is great! Pictures look awesome, and the camera is sturdy. Recently took it hiking where it got bumped around quite a bit and not a scratch! The only problem is batteries run down fairly quickly but buying a couple sets of recharging and having extras while out fixes that.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Pics Galore with this unit
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a greatly capable camera. If you are just getting into photography this is a great place to start. If you need a high quality point and shoot camera this can't be beat. It has a simple mode that, well, makes it simple to take pictures in different lighting conditions. Overall, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: BeKind

customer_reviews.title: Worked well until it didn't
customer_reviews.text: After just a few days, the camera won't power on. The display says "Turn power off and back on." Replaced batteries, tried manufacturer's recommended reset procedure; nothing worked. Returned for replacement. Stay tuned...
customer_reviews.author: Meh

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Showed up on time. Works well. Pictures look great. My 25yr old daughter loves it for taking pictures of my grand kids.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cannon

customer_reviews.title: The battery life really sucked
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this is a good camera but with today’s competition, it is worth it to save your money for something a little better, yeah its good for a starter photographer but the quality gets worse in dark areas or at night, the flash is good though. The main reason you should save your money, is the battery life. This camera dies so quicky, even during recording, and the quality? An iPhone is far better. In conclusion, if you have time to wait, get yourself a better and known for quality camera, spend your money on something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Marie s

customer_reviews.title: Look at that focal length and all the features - ...
customer_reviews.text: Look at that focal length and all the features - it's a winner. No hot shoe or articulating screen, but for the price I paid who cares? I've given to my 18 year old daughter - a beginning photographer - for a Christmas present. It should serve most of her needs.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Zamba

customer_reviews.title: it is bigger than it's predecessor
customer_reviews.text: i bought it to replace the one i dropped in the floor! it is bigger, uses more batteries, and has slower shutter speed/reaction time. It's great for taking stills.
customer_reviews.author: orchidchef

customer_reviews.title: Camera powers down for no reason and eats batteries like it's at a buffet.
customer_reviews.text: You will be happier with a good cell phone camera such as I-phone. The quality and dependability of this camera is horrible. Now power downs when trying to take a photo and of course a few weeks past the time of return. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great for still photos, so-so for video
customer_reviews.text: My main complaint is that if you shoot a lot of video, the auto-focus constantly is going off and then doesn't focus completely. For still photos, the zoom is ultra-powerful. I was able to focus on things from yards away.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera for this price
customer_reviews.text: I like that you may use this camera both for macro photos and for the zooming abilities. Quality of the photos is excellent in general. The camera is a bit slow for photographing speedy actions and photos may be blurred. I believe this is the best camera that you may buy for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this, bad auto focus,no manual focus
customer_reviews.text: The zoom is great, but the autofocus is awful(no manual options here). Best bet is use the multiple focus setting:center and dot focus make it worse.this is bad choice, go with another brand in the long zoom point and click category.(
customer_reviews.author: John rambo

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with how easy this camera is to use and how clear each automatic shot turns out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all
customer_reviews.text: The pictire quality on the view screen is horrid. At first i thought i had the settings wrong but no matter what it is just bad. Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First camera
customer_reviews.text: For being my first camera I really like it. The batteries sucks 4AA to have it work, but it’s okay. The optical zoom is nice, the flash is cool, no filters like apps(Instagram, snapchat). The video works good, if a YouTube video. Over all it’s feels good to hold, leans cover and a neck strap, can take it anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect it to be such a good camera but I have such great quality and it takes amazing pictures for the price I had went to Walmart and bought a camera and it sucked the next day this came so I'm returning the other I would definitely recommend! Took pics of the pics I took even though it doesn't do much justice
customer_reviews.author: Laticia

customer_reviews.title: Camera went crazy
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, the camera takes like 5 good photos and then goes crazy, making weird buzzing noises and then somehow angles the lens to the point it captures the curved edge of the zoom lens. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Atomic1

customer_reviews.title: It better quality than the one I had
customer_reviews.text: It better quality than the one I had, but not by a drastic amount. You will go through a lot of batteries if you take a lot of pictures, and because of the amount of time it takes to download the songs. Think I will stick with cameras that come with rechargeable batteries from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Crimson Igarashi

customer_reviews.title: The Preview screen stays on way too long.
customer_reviews.text: There's no way to turn off the preview screen after taking a picture and the preview stays on for several seconds, photographing moving subjects is difficult. Also, it's difficult to get proper focus on a subject.
customer_reviews.author: Robot

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera but I'm having a little trouble figuring out the focus. It doesn't seem to want to change focus without turning in off and back on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it uses everyday for pics and YouTube video he’s in love
customer_reviews.author: fuego77

customer_reviews.title: Image stabalization does virtually nothing in zoom
customer_reviews.text: Returned it a few days later... Image stabalization does virtually nothing in zoom mode. Images get extremely pixelated on max zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S. Seattle

customer_reviews.title: So far do not like the pictures its takes
customer_reviews.text: slightly larger than I anticipated. So far do not like the pictures its takes. Will play with it some more to see if I can adjust settings to my satisfaction. I am returning as I could not get very good pictures. I have used this type camera before with much better result. I even get better results with my phone. Also the box was labeled with warning for lithiom ion battery that was not in the box. When I went to return it in the original box I was told I needed to have it repackaged due to the battery. Again there was no battery of anykind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for photos on travel. The battery compartment is a little bit of hassle (have to align just right). But adequate for a point and shoot camera. Took great photos.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Chavez

customer_reviews.title: a decent camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a good option for people who want a camera that shots photos that are better than the small thin point and shot cameras, and don't want to carry around the heavy fully loaded 35 mm cameras. The camera operates with AA batteries, thus making it easier for bringing on international travels.
customer_reviews.author: mimif

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a really good camera but I think I may have a deffected one because it turns off right when I turn it on it has new batteries and a new sd card and no it's not on powersaving mode.
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really good product, takes good quality pictures, it's light and have a powerful focus and zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena Solis Castro

customer_reviews.title: wonderful camera for beginners
customer_reviews.text: wonderful camera for beginners, just have to play around the scenes and so on you will get great shots, only thing i dont like is that you have to use AA batteries and i am worried the batteries will die out but overall its a fine camera i love it
customer_reviews.author: MissShantie

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with memory card and will not accept my regular SD card.
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind before you buy this camera that you have to have an SDHC memory card. I could not get my regular SD card to work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: We have been through so many batteries it’s unbelievable, went to using rechargeable now. The camera is just sucking everything out of the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: ddoza

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time. This camera comes with regular batteries that is only good for a short time. Also, I used only one day and it completely froze up on me and was unable to hold battery charge even when I put in new batteries. Don't purchase unless you want to return the next day like I did. I was very dissapointed with Sony. I normally love Sony products. Not this time!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: She is extremely happy with this camera
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife when her A65 was stolen. She is extremely happy with this camera. The ZOOM and quality are spot on, as is usual with a SONY camera. Nice for the price
customer_reviews.author: Ron W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had one years ago, and went to a different brand. It just wasn't the same. When I finally got this one i got some great pictures of the the kids, even my photographer friends asked which camera I got
customer_reviews.author: JosilynsMommy

customer_reviews.title: Sony does it again
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera for a good price. It is easy to use and takes good pictures. We had a Sony Cybershot camera before this one and liked it. This new Sony DSCH300/B is larger and is quite a bit more advanced.
customer_reviews.author: Moni B.

customer_reviews.title: ... as a gift and my granddaughter says it's very easy and intuitive to use I would recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Purchase as a gift and my granddaughter says it's very easy and intuitive to use I would recommend this camera
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst camera ever
customer_reviews.text: It needs lots of Batteries. And after a 3rd time of not doing more than turning it on its not turning on anymore. It was a fathers day gift for my dad and Im embarrased to hear that he never got to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Amazing refurbished camera
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these for my adult children and they love them so much. The pics and videos are AMAZING. would love to know what is the best case for them.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi K.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Recipient loves this gift. I have seen her using it on more than one occasion. Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Armijo

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality was terrible. I’ve owned many cameras and this was the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett  Rider

customer_reviews.title: nice but
customer_reviews.text: very much like the camera I been using for 10 years..i have problems in downloading the pictures.i have to download the application every time
customer_reviews.author: lancaster

customer_reviews.title: this camera a photographer recommended it, i bought the rechargeable batteries
customer_reviews.text: this camera a photographer recommended it, i bought the rechargeable batteries. auto focus is slow , i'm still getting to know the camera. important this camera is not the best for motion pictures, it is a good still photo camera, like I said i'm still getting to know the camera, pretty sure i can get better pics
customer_reviews.author: monica vales-melendez

customer_reviews.title: Figure out why it’s not working
customer_reviews.text: I can’t take any pictures. I’m hoping it me. I need to take it to someone to see what’s going on. Set the date..time..etc. hit ok.. shuts off
customer_reviews.author: busgirl28

customer_reviews.title: For beginners
customer_reviews.text: The focus isn't as good as I'd like and the shutter speed is slow. But for beginners it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley and Cody

customer_reviews.title: Picture Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the quality of the camera and pics. Although the battery life is very short.
customer_reviews.author: D. Foor

customer_reviews.title: A camera for beginner or pro
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very easy to use and produces wonderful pictures. If you're just looking for camera to make snapshots or if you're late for camera that has facilities to make professional photographs. This is the camera for you
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great camera and very easy to use, comes with very good product manuel.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick R.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, real pleased with the quality of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff, real pleased with the quality of the camera. Only thing I didn't like was it didn't incluse the owners manual and the rechargeable batteries. All in all very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Battery issue
customer_reviews.text: The camera keeps turning off after taking a single shot. Even after changing the batteries it has the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sampada Mishra

customer_reviews.title: Batteries are horridable
customer_reviews.text: The camera didn’t turn on long. The pictures were great but as far as the batteries it was horrid it has four AA batteries non chargeable. I was very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Wa Collins

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: this is a camera with all the basic features, perfect for a beginner, i use it frequently works great and take good pictures
customer_reviews.author: miguel a ortiz resendiz

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Loved this camera when it was actually working ! 2 months into getting it just stopped working ! So upset. I rarely ever used it . Passed the 30 days so I cannot return it .
customer_reviews.author: Jalissa Ware

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and works great, Still getting used to it's features and love the zoom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Refurbished camera looks great can't beat the price I got it for. The box is damaged but that was stated in the item description very happy
customer_reviews.author: JULIAN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THE ZOOM ISN'T LIKE IN THE AD BUT VERY GOOD CAMERA
customer_reviews.author: TIP.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera and takes good pictures. I trust the Sony name and the camera does it justice
customer_reviews.author: Gracy Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great photos for a decent price!
customer_reviews.text: People tell me the photos I make look like they were done with a very expensive dslr camera!
customer_reviews.author: Super Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works as described!
customer_reviews.text: Product came in even better condition than listed. Only turned it on for a minute to make sure that it worked. Will be a Christmas present
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Camera was in perfect condition. Not even a single scratch. As described by seller. Fast shipping and working like new.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: I loved the camera
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much I will buy one for my friend
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Turner Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: disappointed in battery life. shuts off while filming
customer_reviews.text: Batteries drain too fast. Wish i got a camera with rechargeable battery. Not ideal for youtubers, videos or long photo sessions. Not a professional grade camera for production at all but good for a hobby and regular pics!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my granddaughter and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Thank you. My son is very happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son. He loves it, but is still learning how it works
customer_reviews.author: Bears Fan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The camera will cut off every time you try to use the zoom, and it will not take a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Healthcare Worker

customer_reviews.title: Honest description of the item.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have been very happy with the camera you provided. It was exactly as you had described, and your shipping service was very prompt. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: DWalt

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!?
customer_reviews.text: Everything I needed in a camera customer service was an important piece of my success with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur George

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t buy again. It didn’t have a lot of functions, and it was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Tarra Love

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love that this camera is so easy to use! I bought it used and figured it was a pretty good deal. Pictures are clear, zoom works great. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kait Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, havent got to play with this much, yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lorenzana

customer_reviews.title: Product works great for distance and close up pictures
customer_reviews.text: Product works great for distance and close up pictures. Easy to use and takes fantastic pictures. Good price and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughter developed an interest in photography so we needed a camera that has a good amount of functions without breaking the bank. She loves it! It is easy to operate, great zoom and has enough settings that she can tinker with without it becoming overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: That you have to tap the shutter button to auto focus.
customer_reviews.author: PHD candidate Percy Carter

customer_reviews.title: My camera arrives quickly and is like new. Everything functions well
customer_reviews.text: My camera arrives quickly and is like new. Everything functions well. I'm so in love with my new Sony Cyber Shot DSC H300.
customer_reviews.author: tran tran

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Had good zoom and quality in good light. Quality does suffer in low light situations.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Really nice camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice camera! Was a present for my son and he likes it a lot. It's a little on the heavy side but easy to grip. Zoom is awesome and the view screen is a nice size. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Mom

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for a beginners camera. Not good if you are a vlogger!
customer_reviews.author: ShauniiDee

customer_reviews.title: Misleading information
customer_reviews.text: The description states that it shoots video in 1080i . It actually is only 720. Which is a huge disappointment. I was able to get a good deal on it, but feel mislead into thinking I was getting a different camera.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would take amazing sharp photos
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mainly because of the 20 mega pixels. Thought it would take amazing sharp photos. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my father; he loves it! Hasn't taken photos in years, I was trying to get him back into it and this definitely​ did the trick. Easy to use, easy to transfer to a computer or printing station.
customer_reviews.author: Violentnacho

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful camera and takes great pictures love the built in zoom feature
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great  Camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for the money. Still learning some of the features but it takes really nice pictures. I took pictures of the surrounding mountains with the focus at 900mm and they came out great.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Reardon

product_meta.title: Sony DSCH300/B Digital Camera (Black)
product_meta.description:
Configuration:Base| Color:BlackSony Digital Camera. Do not aim the camera at the sun or other bright light. It may cause the malfunction of the camera

FROM THE MANUFACTURER



SONY HIGH ZOOM POINT AND SHOOT CAMERA


ADDITIONAL FEATURES
GET EVERYTHING UP CLOSE WITH POWERFUL 35X OPTICAL ZOOM
Get amazingly close with 35x optical zoom with the professional Sony lens. Your subjects will remain in great detail with this long zoom length.

MINIMIZED BLUR WITH OPTICAL STEADYSHOT IMAGE STABILIZATION
Shoot incredibly smooth video1 and still images with Optical SteadyShot Image Stabilization with Active mode. This technology works to deliver sharp image quality with low noise and minimal blur even while the user is strolling and the camera is zoomed in.

20.1MP SUPER HAD CCD SENSOR FOR BEAUTIFULLY DETAILED IMAGES
A powerful 20.1 megapixel super HAD CCD image sensor helps you capture gorgeous images with superb contrast and clarity down to the finest detail.

SIMPLIFY CAMERA MENU WITH EASY MODE
Put your camera in easy mode to minimize the layers in your menu. This makes your shooting experience easy and enjoyable!

PICTURE EFFECT FOR MORE EXPRESSIVE PHOTOS
Picture Effect adds a new level of expression to photos, making ordinary landscapes and portraits come to life by heightening mood and emphasizing certain attributes. Picture Effect can be applied to still images (4 modes), movies (4 modes) and panoramic shots (3 modes), giving photos and movies even greater impact.

SWEEP PANORAMA MODE (UP TO 360°)
Reach beyond the traditional wide angle lens, and capture more breathtaking shots with Sweep Panorama mode. Simply press the shutter button and sweep the camera in the desired direction and the camera continuously shoots at a high speed, then seamlessly stitches the images together with automatic position adjustment to create one stunning panoramic image. Available in wide and up to 360° full circle, the camera can take a variety of panoramic shots. Now capturing wide landscapes is as easy as press and sweep.

SMILE SHUTTER TECHNOLOGY AUTOMATICALLY CAPTURES SMILES
Smile Shutter technology captures a smile the moment it happens. Simply press the Smile Shutter button and the camera does the rest. You can also select adult and child priority and indicate the degree of Smile Detection sensitivity. Intelligent Scene Recognition can now be used together with Smile Shutter mode when the Intelligent Auto mode is on. This means that beautiful smiles can be captured with settings optimized for the particular scene, even in difficult conditions such as twilight and backlighting.

PARTY MODE OPTIMIZES FLASH TO LIGHTING CONDITION
Shoot in challenging lighting situations with Party Mode. The camera automatically adjusts ISO sensitivity, exposure compensation and saturation to enable easy capturing of bright, vivid party photos.

DSLR-LIKE BODY & EVF PROVIDE STEADY SHOT WHEN ZOOMING
The DSC-H300 was designed with ease of use in mind. Its ergonomic grip, similar to those on standard single-lens reflex cameras, makes handling the camera easy. The Images are clearly displayed in the viewfinder, with minimal reflection, even when shooting outdoors in bright sunlight.

3.0” (921K DOTS) CLEAR PHOTO LCD DISPLAY
Generous 3.0” (921K dots) Clear Photo LCD display features sharp, natural color that makes it easy to compose shots, read menus, and view photos, even in bright sunlight.

1Records in 29 minute segments 2Requires HDTV and HDMI cable sold separately

Operating temperature:-10 ~ +40℃ (operation)/ -20 ~ +60℃ (storage).201MP Super HAD CCD sensor for beautifully detailed images
Minimized Blur with optical SteadyShot image stabilization
